properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 10 at 9:21PM CST until January 11 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Norman OK
properties.description:
* WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow and sleet
accumulations of up to one inch and ice accumulations of a light
glaze. Strong winds gusting as high as 40 mph.

* WHERE...In Oklahoma, Jefferson County. In Texas, Baylor,
Archer and Clay Counties.

* WHEN...Until noon CST Saturday.

* IMPACTS...Slick spots on bridges and overpasses will be possible
through Saturday morning.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Wind gusts will create very cold wind chill
values in the single digits and lower teens.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

In Oklahoma, call 8 4 4 4 6 5 4 9 9 7 for road information. In
Texas, call 8 0 0 4 5 2 9 2 9 2 for road information.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST SATURDAY
